amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to provide the Army Corps of Engineers with the authority to help mitigate any detrimental impacts to municipal water supply resulting from a Corps construction project.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Schrader.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
